column1: Bavette's Bar & Boeuf////This review is only for the bar. We stopped in after a cooking class at the Chopping Block for a drink. I had heard this place was pretty cool. I have to say
column2: the whole 'speakeasy' thing is a little over done
column3: but I loved Bavette's! I thought they really got it right
column4: it really felt like I was in Boardwalk Empire or something! Love the music
column5: bartenders (Andrew was ours and he was great
column6: he explained all the crazy things he was putting in various drinks
column8: ambiance. I tried the Champagne Cocktail and the Champagne Crush. The Cocktail was my favorite. My husband had the manhatten on the menu and said it was great. Overall
column9: awesome place. I will be back for sure
